channel.title: Need help with Recolouring the Kitchen
channel.description:
So my parents want to give the kitchen another colour.
And they ask me if i could photoshop it to that colour, i remembered i did that a long time ago. But now since im not realy active with photoshop anymore i kinda forgot.
Can someone help me out with a few tips about how to do this.
This are the pictures:
[img]http://s14.postimg.org/5arausov5/image.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s14.postimg.org/5z05dqnkx/image.jpg[/img]
